title: Guilty Bastard
description: She's a club whore, not looking for love.Lisa Higgins has been part of the Grim Bastards MC since she was seventeen years old. She’s always accepted her place in the club, until Round steals her heart.He's a bastard, full of guilt. Carter Roundtree has never forgiven himself for not loving his old lady the way he should have. That guilt is made worse when Lisa works her way into his heart.Can a bastard and a whore find love in each other’s arms?
author: Emily Minton
